hotels.vendor_name: The Joseph, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Nashville
hotels.title: Stylish Award-Winning Downtown Nashville Luxury Collection Art Hotel with Rooftop Pool & Daily Dining Credit
hotels.description: Soaring 21 stories above Music City, Nashville’s only Forbes Star Award-winning hotel radiates sophistication. This Luxury Collection gem in the heart of downtown is adorned with handcrafted details, a curated collection of 1,000 rare artworks, and elegant nods to the city’s musical roots. Culinary excellence takes centre stage at Yolan, serving refined Italian fare. The property also features three alluring cocktail bars, including the uber-chic rooftop, Denim, and intimate speakeasy, Four Walls. When not eating, drinking or exploring, ascend to the top floor for a serene rooftop pool and the refuge of Rose, the luxurious on-site spa featuring an extensive range of spa and salon services. Perfectly positioned in the fashionable SoBro neighbourhood, the hotel places you just blocks from Nashville’s top cultural attractions. You're mere steps from the Country Music Hall of Fame and Schermerhorn Symphony Centre, plus acclaimed Tennessee dining spots and the iconic live music scene of Broadway.

hotels.title: Vibrant Nashville Vacation with Modern American Brasserie & Rooftop Pool
hotels.description: The Kimpton Aertson Hotel, an IHG Hotel, nestled in Nashville's iconic Music Row, offers a luxurious and contemporary escape. Enjoy a splash in the rooftop pool or head to the onsite modern American brasserie, Henley, for seasonal hand-crafted cocktails and inventive plates showcasing local produce. You'll be ideally located to explore the best of Nashville with renowned music studios, honky-tonks and live music venues right outside your door.

hotels.title: Luxury Downtown Nashville Stay with Four Onsite Restaurants & Rooftop Pool
hotels.description: Dance along to the tune of the Music City with a glorious stay at this glamorous haven, perfectly positioned in the heart of downtown Nashville. Boasting an ideal location, the hotel provides easy access to the famed Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum and the vibrant Broadway strip. Satisfy your culinary cravings at Kitchen Notes, offering traditional Southern dishes, or indulge in a handcrafted cocktail at Barlines. For a touch of relaxation, the Mokara Spa awaits, offering a range of rejuvenating treatments.
